short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pinterest extra allows it users to view the analytics of pins aswell as downloading them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash Pinterest's Hidden Insights with Pinterest Extra!
This game-changing extension unlocks a treasure trove of data for every pin, revealing insightful metrics like saves, repins, likes, dominant colors, and original source.
With a single click, you can effortlessly download individual pins or batch-download multiple pins simultaneously.
Perfect for content creators, marketers, and Pinterest power users, Pinterest Extra empowers you to optimize your strategy, boost engagement, and stay ahead of the game.
Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to data-driven success on Pinterest!
